title: Floor 1 - Central Hub
description: Four passages branch from this central chamber. Blackened torch brackets line the walls, most smashed or bent. The remaining flames sputter weakly.

onEnter.log: You reach the hub of the first floor. Four dark passages await exploration.

exits.log: You enter a passage marked by faded religious symbols.
You investigate a cramped storage alcove.
You push through to a collapsed archive.
Having explored all branches, you descend the stairs to Floor 2.
